Package com.patienttriage.repository

Interface AppointmentRepository

All Superinterfaces:
org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<Appointment,Long>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Appointment,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListCrudRepository<Appointment,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListPagingAndSortingRepository<Appointment,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<Appointment,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor<Appointment>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<Appointment,Long>
@Repository public interface AppointmentRepository extends org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Appointment,Long>
Repository interface for Appointment entity operations.

    • findConflictsByDoctor

      @Query("SELECT a FROM Appointment a WHERE a.doctor.id = :doctorId AND a.appointmentTime = :time") List<Appointment> findConflictsByDoctor(@Param("doctorId") Long doctorId, @Param("time") LocalDateTime time)
      Finds appointments with time conflicts for a doctor.
      Parameters:
      doctorId - the doctor ID
      time - the appointment time to check
      Returns:
      list of conflicting appointments

      Finds appointments with time conflicts for a patient.
